data.actual_result: When you Click on "Share" nothing happenes. The "Screen Share Pop-up" just closes

data.steps_to_repro: - Open DiscordPTB -Second Step- Go to the DM's of a friend -Third Step- Click on "Start Voice Call" -Fourth Step- Click on "Turn on Screen Share" and select a random Screen"
